articles.description: Megan Rapinoe has taken aim at various coaches embroiled in the abuse scandal surrounding the NWSL in America, and labelled ex-Chicago Red Stars coach Rory Dames an 'a**hole'.

articles.title: Plymouth Argyle: The stats which show the Pilgrims deserve top spot in League One - Plymouth Live
articles.description: Argyle maintained their 100 per cent record at Home Park this season when they beat Sheffield Wednesday 2-1 on Tuesday
articles.content:
Plymouth Argyle are setting a ferocious pace at the top of League One with nine wins and 28 points from their first 12 games.
It has been a superb start to the season for Steven Schumacher's Pilgrim… [+3586 chars]
